isis.stitle: TSI 97-12-02 - Replace Dow Corning With Wacker RTV Sealant For International® T 444E, 530 And DT 466/466E Engines

subjectgroup.subject: Replace Dow Corning With Wacker RTV Sealant For International® T 444E, 530 And DT 466/466E Engines

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: A new silicone rubber RTV sealant, Wacker T-442 liquid gasket replaces Dow Corning 3-0105 liquid gasket for specified use with subject engines. The new sealant will improve adhesion and is more compatible with aluminum material.

Specified location usage is given throughout the engine service manual. Clean all sealing surfaces on parts as described in the manual. Install mating parts within 5 minutes of applying Wacker T-442 RTV sealant.

The new RTV sealant is available for service in 6.0 fl. oz. tube (P/N 1830858C1) or 10.3 fl. oz. caulking tube (1830856C1) and replaces sealant, P/N 1824484C1; 1.5 fl. oz. tube and P/N 1824485C1; 6.0 fl. oz. tube.

note.para: THIS SEALANT IS INTENDED FOR USE WITH ENGINE LUBRICANTS AND IS NOT RECOMMENDED FOR SEALING ETHYLENE GLYCOL AND WATER APPLICATIONS.
